item.title: Simulating tombstone (suspended state) on Windows Phone 7 emulator
item.description: Since Windows Phone 7 doesnâ€™t have multitask, at least for now, Microsoft implemented a Tombstone notion in WP7 apps. Itâ€™s basically a suspended state where you receive a notification that itâ€™s going to suspend but there is no guarantee that it will resume, it might be terminated so you must treat this as an exit and a might start again state. So depending on you app you might want to save the current state just in case the app really closes.
